hero.name: Marine Allavoine
hero.description: Front-End Dev on a mission to make the web more accessible.

about.aboutContent: Hi, I'm Marine! With a degree in Visual Arts and a background as a visual merchandiser, I decided to reinvent myself in web development and completed training as a FrontEnd developer. My goal? To put my expertise at the service of accessibility for everyone. My journey? An eclectic mix of art, commerce, and technology. I discovered my passion for digital accessibility, a quest that drives me every day. Welcome to my universe, where aesthetics and functionality come together to offer unique and inclusive web experiences.
